Text: Not to be a bitch, but it's Quadrology, not tetrology ;) But awesome upload :)

@random-arrow:

Tetra-logy actually is a word in our English dictionary which is a series of four related works, such as an opera or drama.  It comes from the Greek word "tetralogia" which i assume would be a close relation in meaning.  Guess it's time to brush up on my Greek!

Look it up in a Websters Dictionary.  There are other meanings for Tetra-logy.
